column5: Finally got an ok from friends for a quick fishing trip on Buckhorn Aug 5-6 and looking for accommodations. Just need 1 night and boat slip and was hoping for suggestions. Check Three Castles and they are booked solid.  I can always find a spot in Fenelon Falls but was hoping for an easy launch to Lower Buckhorn etc.  Any suggestions welcome.

There's a cottage resort right at the north end of the bridge in Buckhorn but darned if I can think of the name, even though I've used his ramp dozens of times. Nice cabins with a great ramp and your right at the west end of the lake.  Somebody will chime in with the name unless I can get my old brain working.
The resort is Sunrise if you are thinking of the resort on Lower Buckhorn Lew. They do have a ramp and you could go through the locks if you wanted to fish Upper Buckhorn.  kawarhta Kev
Check the resort on Deer bay.  I always go to 3 Castles, and they are fantastic, but the resort on Deer bay usually have some last minute availabilty.  Sorry, name escapes me.
Yup, that's the one Kev, thanks.  Bugger to get old(er)
http://www.sunriseresort.ca/  This is their new website.
There is also Reach harbour on Lower Buckhorn   http://www.reachharbour.com/ or check out the Buckhorn District Tourist Association  http://buckhorn.ca/  Kawartha Kev
The resort is Beachwood. It also has a boat launch at site and good food if you don't want to cook
